definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: It’s got to be Playa Blanca, insists one Canary-phile.
sentences.chinese: 肯定是普拉亞布蘭卡，一個歌星phile堅持說。

sentences.english: Playa Tamarindo is as close to picture perfect as you can get.
sentences.chinese: 普拉亞塔馬林多是你能看到的圖片中近乎完美的。

sentences.english: Relax at one of these great Playa del Carmen hotels.
sentences.chinese: 在普拉亞戴爾卡門的酒店好好放鬆吧。
